channel.title: The end
channel.description: Face it. Hate began before time, before light, before the moon blessed us with its love and care, before the sun caressed us with its warm hands. We'll never stop it. Here and everywhere, your hate and mine hurts us all and propagates itself in our children. We could stop it. We could stop everything. But no. We hate others for hating. We hate ourselves for hating others. So open your window and bask in the light. Whether you see the sun or the moon right now doesn't matter. North or south, east or west, Christian or Muslim, we're all the same essentially. We all need and want. Love yourself and love your fellows. Fuck the celebration of differences; difference breeds discriminatory conduct. You preach peace and act violently. Good job. I won because I lost, and that kindled someone's fire. So accept your loss and thus win, so someone else might have their fire burn again. Lost and delirious, they wander in silence. They don't speak because they don't know. Run through the grass and love the feeling of cold and warm and everything you feel. It is good because it is bad. There is nothing but yourself and your light. Feed that light and keep it burning. Live forever because you desire death. Die now because you cling to life. Walk free in the planar sphere.

item.title: The end

So accept your loss and thus win, so someone else might have their fire burn again. Lost and delirious, they wander in silence. They don’t speak because they don’t know. Run through the grass and love the feeling of cold and warm and everything you feel. It is good because it is bad. There is nothing but yourself and your light. Feed that light and keep it burning. Live forever because you desire death. Die now because you cling to life. Walk free in the planar sphere.
[/quote]

  1. since when does the moon have feelings?
  2. The sun doesn’t have hands, infact its made up of helium and other random elements.
  3. i don’t have the time to quote more crap from this. Get on with life.[/quote]
    Some people take things way to seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: The end
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:82, topic:165154”][quote author=cooper link=topic=224134.msg1936309#msg1936309 date=1197890901]

everyone just shut the fuck up and stop being retarded, SL was tripping when he said all that shit and a bunch of assholes wanted to seem cool so you agreed with him n shit then the other ppl argued with them and now its come to this, just shut the fuck up all of you and let this get locked.

Why would I want to seem cool? I probably hate most of the mother fuckers here.

i wasn’t speaking to you i was speaking to that yupolascape guy and the other one

Once again, my apologies. I really should learn to control my language [and temper] better
[/quote]
its okay, and im sorry to, right now i really dont feel good because 9 hours ago i finally stopped tripping on diphenhydramine and im still feeling nauseas and i have a mild headache[/quote]
I have very little experience, actually none, with getting off drugs, but you should try drinking lots of fluids [preferably water] and lying down, it might help a little.

item.title: The end
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:76, topic:165154”]All I have to say is… I agree with STH, Goatee, and Wixter.

We’ve had hundreds of topics like this in the past. Nothing is new, except the members posting in the topics. Because these new members came from MoparScape, they are ignorant to the world around them, so they embrace every new concept as genius, or a radical train of thought. When in reallity it’s just a lonely drugie desperate for some attention and because everyone on IRC has an already higher level of thinking, that person doesn’t get the praise they’d wished for. So they look to the forums as their secondary source of attention.

It always seems like it’s the Java Guru’s that post these sorts of topics. I really don’t see where there is any use in arguing with the newbies. They don’t understand the way this community runs.[/quote]
I did not start from moparscape, I joined here long before the split. Both sides of the argument are valid, however.

Read full topic

item.title: The end

We’ve had hundreds of topics like this in the past. Nothing is new, except the members posting in the topics. Because these new members came from MoparScape, they are ignorant to the world around them, so they embrace every new concept as genius, or a radical train of thought. When in reallity it’s just a lonely drugie desperate for some attention and because everyone on IRC has an already higher level of thinking, that person doesn’t get the praise they’d wished for. So they look to the forums as their secondary source of attention.

It always seems like it’s the Java Guru’s that post these sorts of topics. I really don’t see where there is any use in arguing with the newbies. They don’t understand the way this community runs.

item.title: The end
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Please shut up, SilverLining surpasses you in every way imaginable.

Okay, since you know so much about his and my entire life, explain.

I like the fact that SL is like the only one who is tripping. Yet the others are like "ahmagad what he's saying must be true cos he's on drugs" so they copy him, spewing shit from there pathetic little minds onto an already dismal forum.

Quote from: I Br3ndan I on December 16, 2007, 03:26:00 PM

Can’t you be open minded and attempt to relate to, or understand what he’s saying? I highly doubt-I know he wasn’t posting this for attention as you put it.

You don’t even understand what he’s saying. He’s on drugs, your 7 years old. STFU.

And cooper can STFU aswell.

SL needs to get some friends he can enjoy drugs with, rather than sitting in his dark bedroom with a bag full of pills posting mindless bullshit on a forum for runescape cheating.

I. Fucking. Concur.
It’s amazing that this forum has come to stupid shit like this and spam everywhere else.
I don’t see this as an intelligent conversation at all.
I almost feel like my IQ has dropped from reading these crazy arguements.
And it’s not that I’m not intelligent enough to understand it. I’ve done drugs, and I’m actually really smart.

This is still rediculous.

Read full topic

Attention. And then half of the community agrees with him when they too dont have a clue what hes on about, probly because of his status on the forum. Kind of pathetic dont you think?[/quote]
Even if he was hated and had no status to the community, I would still agree with him, because those kind of things do not pertain to this.

Silver Lining:

Ah, so true cooper. Ancient people would consider my massive rush of thought normal because their minds hadn’t been crushed by ignorance.

What has the world come to :\

item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:60, topic:165154”]I like the fact that SL is like the only one who is tripping. Yet the others are like “ahmagad what he’s saying must be true cos he’s on drugs” so they copy him, spewing shit from there pathetic little minds onto an already dismal forum.

Can’t you be open minded and attempt to relate to, or understand what he’s saying? I highly doubt-I know he wasn’t posting this for attention as you put it.

You don’t even understand what he’s saying. He’s on drugs, your 7 years old. STFU.

And cooper can STFU aswell.

SL needs to get some friends he can enjoy drugs with, rather than sitting in his dark bedroom with a bag full of pills posting mindless bullshit on a forum for runescape cheating.[/quote]

[quote=“goatee, post:62, topic:165154”]So you decided to project you’re crazy drug shit on 7 year olds who only want to talk about private servers?

I’m not against drugs I’m just saying that you should let the kids find out rather than writing loads of stuff they think they understand. Because then they will start thinking that all drugs are good and doing that is nearly as bad as the twats who say weed kills you.[/quote]

  1. I don’t play runescape or any private servers or anything, I just make one for fun. I am not 7, and not everyone on this forum is a dumbfuck, it is possible to relate to what he’s saying without doing drugs. Besides, I never will.
  2. This forum is not only for runescape cheating, as there are many other categories, such as the one we are in.
